title: Process a Group Hotel Booking
description: A tour operator wants to book a block of 10 rooms for a group for a 3-night stay.

tasks.description: Check availability for a block of 10 rooms for the specified dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that 10 rooms are available.

tasks.description: Provide a discounted group rate per room and create a group booking proposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a group rate and generates a formal proposal.

tasks.description: Create a master group block in the system and provide the tour operator with a group booking code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the group block and provides the code for individual guest assignments.
